data.comment: The match is underway. Cercle Brugge have kicked-off.
Goal! Genk have got their heads in front thanks to a Paul Onuachu strike.
In the minute 18, Goal! Genk extend their lead to 0-2 through Junya Ito.
Goal! Bryan Heynen extends Genk lead to 0-3 with a header.
Dino Hotic for Cercle Brugge has been booked by Kevin Van Damme and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Paul Onuachu puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-4.
The first half has been concluded at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The second-half has commenced. Genk with the kick-off.
In the minute 51, Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-4 through a strike by Dino Hotic. .
Paul Clement (Cercle Brugge) is making a first substitution, with Alexander Corryn replacing Charles Vanhoutte.
Jean Harrison Marcelin (Cercle Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, Goal! Genk extend their lead to 1-5 through Theo Bongonda.
Kouassi Eboue is on a sub for Bryan Heynen for Genk.
Cyriel Dessers is replacing Paul Onuachu for the away team.
In the minute 78, Cercle Brugge make their second substitution with Thibo Somers replacing Anthony Musaba.
Luca Oyen is replacing Theo Bongonda for Genk at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The home team replace Dino Hotic with Leonardo da Silva Lopes.
That's full-time at Jan Breydel Stadium. The final score is 1-5.
